description: A file is an object that contains information generated from a process, either an Experiment or an Analysis.

checksum.description: A sha256 checksum of the file. This is used to verify the integrity of the file.

format.description: The format of the file. This should be a valid file extension, e.g. 'txt', 'csv', 'json', 'xml', 'pdf', 'png', 'jpg', 'mp4', 'mp3', etc.

size.description: The size of the file in bytes.
